questions.question_text: "sustainability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The practice of minimizing environmental impact for long-term balance
The process of hiring new staff
questions.example_sentence: The new initiative focuses on sustainability across all company operations.
questions.explanation:
持続可能性・環境配慮
短期マーケティング
税政策
採用活動

questions.question_text: "initiative" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A new plan or program designed to improve something
questions.example_sentence: Several new initiatives aim to reduce energy use by 30 percent.
questions.explanation:
新たな計画・取り組み
法律上の義務
日常的なメンテナンス
罰金

questions.question_text: "emission" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The release of gas or substances into the environment
questions.example_sentence: The report shows a significant decrease in carbon emissions this year.
questions.explanation:
排出・放出
売上
退職制度
マーケティングツール

questions.question_text: "monitor" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To observe or track something carefully over time
questions.example_sentence: Departments are required to monitor their monthly energy consumption.
questions.explanation:
監視・記録する
修理
宣伝活動
苦情対応

questions.question_text: "compliance" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of following rules or regulations
The beginning of a new construction project
questions.example_sentence: The company improved compliance with environmental regulations through new training.
questions.explanation:
規則遵守・コンプライアンス
管理職の会議
資金援助の依頼
建設開始
